pages.text: Conveyors can be used to transport items, entities and fluids. They can interact with the world using $(l:conveyor_upgrades)upgrades$(). Items and entities can go up and down on the conveyors but fluids can only go horizontal. $(br2)Conveyors can be colored by right-clicking them with a dye.
Using glowstone can make the conveyors move items and entities very fast.
Using plastic will prevent items from being picked up when they are on top of a conveyor.
